bioconda.name: bioconductor-regsplice
bioconda.summary: L1-regularization based methods for detection of differential splicing

biotools.summary: Statistical methods for detection of differential exon usage in RNA-seq and exon microarray data sets, using L1 regularization (lasso) to improve power.

bioschemas.name: regsplice
bioschemas.summary: Statistical methods for detection of differential exon usage in RNA-seq and exon microarray data sets, using L1 regularization (lasso) to improve power.
